total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells in the input grid that are surrounded by the same number on all four sides (up, down, left, right).
Q2: Check if the number in the center cell is different from the surrounding number.
Q3: If the center number is different, change it to the surrounding number.
Q4: Repeat this process for all cells in the grid.
Q5: The final grid after all changes is the output grid.
Q1: Identify the cells in the input grid that are surrounded by the same number on all four sides (up, down, left, right).
Q2: Check if the number surrounding the cell is different from the number in the cell.
Q3: If the conditions in Q1 and Q2 are met, change the number in the cell to the number that surrounds it.
Q4: Repeat this process for all cells in the grid.
Q1: Identify the cells in the input grid that are surrounded by the same number on all four sides (up, down, left, right).
Q2: Check if the number in the center cell is different from the surrounding number.
Q3: If the center number is different, replace it with the surrounding number.
Q4: Repeat this process for all cells in the grid.
Q5: The final grid after all replacements is the output grid.
